basic_programming.name: Basic Programming
basic_programming.des: Basic programming provides the foundation for writing code, using variables, loops, conditionals, and functions to solve simple problems.

oop.name: Object-Oriented Programming
oop.des: Object-Oriented Programming organizes code around objects, enabling better data management and behavior through concepts like classes, inheritance, encapsulation, and polymorphism

ds_algo.name: Data Structures and Algorithms
ds_algo.des: Data Structures and Algorithms focus on efficiently organizing and processing data to solve complex programming problems.
